content.p: The process of learning is never over. We offer various training courses and programmes to help graduates, academics, and researchers improve their knowledge and skills. Are you interested in learning more about clinical trials? The NCTU hosts a 5-day course which introduces the key considerations when designing and conducting a randomised clinical trial. They primarily focus on large multi-centre clinical trials. Book onto the short course The CATP is an initiative to assist medical graduates in the development of academic and clinical skills. This is usually part of their career pathway towards becoming senior academic clinicians, leading research for the benefit of patients. Find out more about CATP We offer a comprehensive Clinical Academic Training pathway for non-medical health care professionals like nurses, midwifes, paramedics and more.
